programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jennison is here to break up Scooter's marriage. Next Jana thinks her boyfriend is cheating, so she invited our cameras to join her when she confronted him at his home. A search of his house revealed another woman in the closet Jana's twin sister!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: My Husband Won't Have Sex With Me!
programme.desc: Joe’s obsession with sex toys drove Bonnie to his friend Brent! Andy wants his ex Diane back, but she’s in love with someone else! Kelli’s husband Anthony has been cheating with their neighbor!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I Had Sex With My Baby Mama's Twin
programme.desc: Brittany's twin seems ready, willing and able to pick up her slack; Junior offers his wife a symbolic gesture of his love and commitment, but she has moved on; Becca is crazy about her boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Wayne doesn't know his fiancee, Kristin, is sleeping with her cousin! Next Springer Cam is there when JB drops the bomb on both of his girlfriends and tells them he's been cheating. Later Vinnie is sleeping with his best friend's fiancee, Shannon.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Alex says he was forced into his relationship with his girlfriend, and he has a secret to reveal; two women wrestle in applesauce for Lexi's love; Tai has moved from Atlanta to Ohio to be with his baby-mama, but she has a confession to make.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I Slept With 120 Men ... and Yours
programme.desc: Paige admits to sleeping with her friend's boyfriend; Alex confesses to cheating with two women; Kaylynn decides to get even with her friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: When John was sent away to prison, he asked brother Derrick to help take care of his family, but he never imagined Derrick would hook up with his baby mama! Then, John's tired of being Crystal's meal ticket and taking care of her family.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Danny plans to leave his child's mother for a stripper; Richard confesses to his fiancee that he cheated while she was locked up; Dorreon wants to put the kibosh on his relationship.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Paris began prostituting at 11 years old and has continued for the last 10 years. She says she didn't like living by her moms rules so she left home and turned to prostitution to make money and take care of herself. Special guest host, Steve Wilkos is here to help her turn her life around.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Three women fight over the same man; a woman must choose between marrying her fiancé or her cousin.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: Sisters Pregnant by the Same Man
programme.desc: Our cameras were at home with sisters Olivia and Catherine when Olivia confronted her older sister for sleeping with her boyfriend, Jacob. Next Jeromy has been having an affair with 2 sisters and both are now pregnant!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A woman wants the truth from her sister and boyfriend; a woman must decide between two men; a woman hooks up with her friend's boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Tim doesn't know if he wants to be with Desiree, his wife and mother of his daughter, or Victoria his gorgeous coworker and Mistress. Then, Olivia is here because she's sick and tired of her husband Fred's cheating ways.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Dustin admits to cheating on his partner with his middle-school crush; psychic Nana says she has a premonition that her fiance is sleeping with her friend; Desiree believes that another woman is contending with her over her boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Pamela is here today to tell her best friend, Terri, that she is sleeping with her son, Brandon. Next Deaire has been sleeping with Brenda’s 62-year-old mother! Then Brandi will tell her fiancé that she's been having an affair with twin brothers!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Cheyenne says her boyfriend has cheated far too many times; Chanti blames her boyfriend's behavior on social media; Selina hates her brother's ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Diamynn admits to hooking up with a man who has a girlfriend and a child; Angel regrets kissing Brittany and does not want to rekindle a relationship with her; Kaitlyn says her husband's floundering wrestling career is hard on their family.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Juice is here to reveal to Jessica that he’s a woman. Jolene has been sleeping with her sister’s girlfriend, Stephanie! Chante doesn’t approve of her sister’s fiancée and won’t hold her peace at their wedding!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Angelica is unapologetic about sleeping with her twin's boyfriend; Makayla confronts the woman with whom her children's father hooked up; Stormy wants to take a shower with her friend Jessica.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Eddie has been with his girlfriend for 3 years but he wants to tell her that he has been sleeping with a man for the last 5 months of their relationship.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Glenda has been hiding two secrets from her boyfriend: She's secretly been seeing her ex and she wants to be a stripper! Then Veronica broke up with Roland when she caught him cheating. Now she's dating one of his friends and Roland wants her back.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kiki taught Kat the ropes whens he started in the strip clubs and then they became lovers. But now Kat is dumping Kiki for a man! Later Cedric is here to tell his girlfriend that he wants to join him in a threesome with his secret lover, Eric!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Taylor's here to reveal that he's been cheating on Jenna with another girl and her stripper cousin! Then, it's a sibling rivalry for the ages when Cody finds out that his girl Amanda has been cheating on him with his own brother Brandon!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Taylor's fiance reveals the truth; Falin wants her engaged friend to know that she has been hooking up with her man; Yashisca's fiance wants to get all of his skeletons out of the closet before taking a trip down the aisle.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nick's girlfriend finds out why he spends so much time with their neighbor; Osha's boyfriend scored with his female friend; Brandi resents her boyfriend's reckless behavior after all of the sacrifices she has made to keep their relationship.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kiki wants to marry the man who cheated with her cousin; Tayshun blames his girlfriend for his infidelity; a porn star wants her crush to act out a scene with her.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mr. Panama is back and still cannot decide which girl he wants to be with. Next Chauntey is a transsexual who’s cheating with her lover's brother! Later Chris is back and he's still trying to play Dee and Rhonda at the same time.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Amanda's a workaholic mother losing her grasp on a 3rd marriage and in desperate need of help.Then Daniel's learning that all it takes to ruin an engagement is one bad night as his brief love affair with his fiancee's mother is back to haunt him!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: A Dad, Tacos & the Kung Fu Kid
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is having sex with their son-in-law; a man cheats with one of his girlfriend's best friends; a man suspects his girlfriend is cheating with his friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A man cheats with his girlfriend's cousin; a man cheats on his wife with his ex-lover.
